recipes.dynamicTitle: Curtis Stone's tomato and bread salad with BBQ eggplant and capsicum
recipes.dynamicDescription: For a crowd-pleasing salad, try this tasty combination of fresh tomato, crunchy bread and BBQ veggies. It’s topped with fresh basil and oregano for a finishing touch.
recipes.dynamicThumbnailAlt: Tomato, bread and eggplant salad served in a large plate topped with basil leaves with vinaigrette on the side

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup (250ml) extra virgin olive oil, divided
4 cups (240g) 2cm-pieces day-old Coles Bakery Stone Baked by Laurent Pane Di Casa

recipes.dynamicTitle: Pork, fennel and sage ragu with polenta
recipes.dynamicDescription: Put your slow cooker to work and make this mouth-watering pork ragu. Served with fluffy polenta, it’s a guaranteed crowd-pleaser.
recipes.dynamicThumbnailAlt: Pork ragu served on top of polenta with fennel and fried sage on top with bread on the side

ingredients.ingredient: 1.2kg Coles Australian Pork Slow Cook Scotch Roast, cut into 10cm pieces
1 tsp ground fennel or fennel seeds
1 small fennel, thinly sliced, fronds reserved
